key_themes: AI infrastructure capex and agent monetization
Technical momentum deterioration and year-end consolidation
Sector rotation from software/fintech weakness to utilities/metals
Regulatory fragmentation risks in European markets

Banking regulatory capital tightening offsetting rate benefits
Post-holiday low volume creating setup for volatility
Divergence between bullish secular narrative and deteriorating near-term technicals

analysis.swing_levels: SPY: $680 near support, $700 call wall primary resistance (144k OI), $630 put wall major support if activated. QQQ: $590 dormant support (78k OI), $630-640 resistance zone (31-32k OI). IWM pressure and SPX prior ATH breakdown level critical for directional confirmation.
